xml.resource:
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>strabic test</title> 
<style type="text/css">
body {
  width: $1px;
	height: $2px;
  font-family: $3;
  color: $4;
  background-color: $5;

	/* Grid */
  background-image: url("ressources/bg_grid.png");
  background-size: 200px 200px;
	
}
</style>
<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.2.min.js"></script>
<script src="ressources/libstrabic.js"></script>
</head>
<body>

<script type="text/javascript">
  /* Scroll middle page */
 	var height = $(document).height();
 	var width = $(document).width();
  $(document).scrollTop(height/4);
  $(document).scrollLeft(width/4);
</script>
</body>
</html>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
	width:$2px;
	height:$3px;
	font-size: 10px;
	text-align: center;
	line-height: 70px
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
  background-color: rgb(255,255,255);
	font-size:12px;
	line-height: normal;
	font-weight: bold;
  color: rgb(0,0,255)
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
  .$1 {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-30deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(-30deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(-30deg);
    position: absolute;
    top: 60px;
    right: -45px;
    width: 100px;
  }
</style>

<style type="text/css">
  .$1 {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(35deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(35deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(35deg);
    position: absolute;
    top: 65px;
    right: 20px;
    width: 100px;
  }
</style>

<style type="text/css">
  .$1 {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(35deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(35deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(35deg);
    position: absolute;
    top: -5px;
    right:-45px;
    width:100px;
  }
</style>

<style type="text/css">
  .$1 {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-35deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(-35deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(-35deg);
    position: absolute;
    top: -10px;
    right: 20px;
    width: 100px;
  }
</style>
